description:
He was the fiercest member of the yakuza, a man who left countless underworld legends in his wake. They called him “the Immortal Dragon.” But one day he walked away from it all to travel another path—the path of the househusband! The curtain rises on this cozy yakuza comedy!

(Source: VIZ Media)
synonyms: De yakuza a amo de casa
Yakuza w fartuszku. Kodeks perfekcyjnego pana domu
The Way of the Househusband Part 1
พ่อบ้านสุดเก๋า
พ่อบ้านสุดเก๋า พาร์ท 1

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

node.description: A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kousuke_oono)

Oono was an assistant of the mangaka [Yoshiaki Sukeno](https://anilist.co/staff/107447/Yoshiaki-Sukeno).

[Website](http://www.uchikubi.com/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWGl1JQoX90LM8hRuRbdFDA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/uchikubigokumon)

打首獄門同好会 (roughly translates to “Prison Fighting Club”) formed in 2004, the line-up consists of 大澤敦史 [Osawa Atsushi] (Vocals and Guitar), 河本あす香 [Kawamoto Asuka] (Drums and Backing Vocals), and Junko (Bass and Backing Vocals). Fourteen years later, the band has only continued to grow, recently doing a show at the famous Nippon Budokan! Currently the band are signed to LD & K Records, and to date have released 11 albums and EPs. A true feat for an independent artist! At this point they are yet to tour outside of Japan, if they can increase their worldwide profile I’m sure they would be a worldwide hit.

(Source: Music of Japan)
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/松倉友二)

Affiliated with [J.C. Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/) since 1992, where he currently serves as the Executive Officer and General Manager of Production Headquarters. Also the representative director of Jam Creation.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
**Honami Yamagishi** is a Japanese editor, who provides editing assistance to various works.

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/LaloGarx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lalogarx/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LaloGarx) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Eduardogaara)

**José Eduardo Garza Escudero** is a Mexican voice actor. He is known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Josh Nichols in _Drake & Josh_, Elmo in _Sesame Street_ and Francis in _Malcolm in the Middle_.
He's the recurring dub voice of Josh Peck and Jonah Hill.

**Non-Anime Roles**:
* Kayn (League of Legends)
* Nightwing / Dick Grayson (Batman: Arkham Knight)
* Dirhael (Middle-Earth: Shadow of Mordor) 
* Delmont "Del" Walker (Gears of War 4)
* Josh Nichols (Drake & Josh)

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.
A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.
